grandSlamOffer.headline: Experience the Ultimate Blues Getaway: 2 Nights of Luxury, Live Music & Southern Soul - With Our 'Play the Blues, Live the Dream' Guarantee
grandSlamOffer.targetPainPoint: Tired of sterile hotels with no character or authentic cultural experiences
grandSlamOffer.dreamOutcome: Immersive blues experience with luxury accommodation, VIP music access, and curated cultural journey
grandSlamOffer.effort: Just pack and arrive - we handle everything else
grandSlamOffer.riskReversal: If you don't experience at least 3 'wow moments' during your stay, your second night is free
bonuses: Private blues history tour with local musician ($297 value)
Exclusive recording session in our Blues Room ($199 value)
Southern soul food cooking class ($159 value)
grandSlamOffer.priceAnchor: Compared to $899/night at Monmouth Historic Inn with no entertainment, get our full blues immersion package for $699/night

criteria: Must have 10k+ following in blues/travel/culture space
Active content creation in last 30 days
Located in Southeast US or major music markets

topTier.approach: Offer exclusive accommodation package for nominees
Exclusive first look at Blues Room concept

scripts.email:
Subject: {{Company}} x Big Muddy Inn: Blues Tourism Innovation

Hi {{name}},

Noticed your recent {{specific_content}} about {{topic}}. We're launching something unique in Natchez - luxury accommodation meets authentic blues experience.

Would you be interested in an exclusive first look? We can offer:
- Custom content angles
- First access to our Blues Room
- Exclusive packages for your audience

Best,
[Name]
scripts.linkedin: Hi {{name}}, your recent post about {{topic}} caught my eye. We're bringing something new to the Mississippi blues scene. Would love to share our vision for elevating blues tourism through luxury experiences. Can we connect?
scripts.coldCall:
1. Introduce and reference recent content
2. Share Blues Room concept
3. Offer exclusive first look
4. Suggest collaboration options
